title: Google\Cloud\Dlp\V2\CustomInfoType\Regex
name: Regex
description:
Message defining a custom regular expression.

Generated from protobuf message google.privacy.dlp.v2.CustomInfoType.Regex

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.pattern
params.description: Pattern defining the regular expression. Its syntax (https://github.com/google/re2/wiki/Syntax) can be found under the google/re2 repository on GitHub.

params.name: data.group_indexes
params.description: The index of the submatch to extract as findings. When not specified, the entire match is returned. No more than 3 may be included.
